animateOpacity.description: Determines whether opacity should be animated, true by default
animateOpacity.description_zh: 确定是否应为不透明度设置动画，默认情况下为 true

transitionDuration.description: Transition duration in ms, 200 by default
transitionDuration.description_zh: 过渡持续时间（以毫秒为单位），默认为 200

transitionTimingFunction.description: Transition timing function, default value is ease
transitionTimingFunction.description_zh: 过渡定时功能，默认值为 ease
